room_title: Escape room "The Great Estate Burglary" by Escape Room Virginia Peninsula in Newport News
room_address: 4410 East Claiborne Square, Suite 212 Hampton, VA 23666
room_description: You’ve been invited to Mr. Dupont’s estate for a grand dinner party. While everyone enjoys cocktail hour, you sneak away to the master bedroom to find something very exquisite - Mrs. Dupont’s most valuable piece of jewelry. You must unlock their bedroom safe to steal the piece before the final toast is given. Make sure you’re back at the table when dinner is served or else you’ll be caught committing the Great Estate Burglary!
